Submodules

articull.articull module

This module is the commandline entry point for running various modes of the application. It sets up the computational environment, parses command-line arguments, and dispatches tasks to the specified module. For instructions on using the command-line interface, run python articull/articull.py -h, or see instructions in Command-line Usage

Functions:
main():

The main function that sets up the argument parser, initializes the computational environment, and runs the specified module.

articull.articull.articull()

The main function that sets up the argument parser, initializes the computational environment, and runs the specified module.

Parameters:

None

Returns:

None
